Chapter Previous Next

class gstCone : public gstShape

Cone primitive. This class represents the geometry of a cone. The default size orientation of the cone is centered at the origin with the tip pointing up the y-axis with height of 2.0 and radius of 1.0.

From header file: gstCone.h
